description: Cumberland Mall, Avenue East Cobb and Town Center at Cobb will be open on Christmas Eve to buy those last-minute holiday gifts.
title: Mall hours for last-minute holiday shopping in Cobb
title_page: Mall hours for last-minute holiday gift shopping in Cobb
text:
Holidays are the busiest time of year and for those who still have some last-minute shopping to do, you're in luck. Several of the malls in Cobb County will be open Christmas Eve.
Town Center at Cobb, located off I-75 on 400 Ernest W. Barrett Parkway, opens bright and early at 7 a.m. and closes at 6 p.m.
Cumberland Mall, located at 1000 Cumberland Mall, will welcome shoppers on Christmas Eve from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.
The Outlet Shoppes at Atlanta, located at 915 Ridgewalk Parkway in Woodstock, will have extended hours on Dec. 23 until 10 p.m. and will open on Christmas Eve from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
The Avenue East Cobb, located at 4475 Roswell Rd in Marietta, opens the latest of the four at 9 a.m. Christmas Eve and remains open to 6 p.m.
All four malls are closed on Christmas Day but will reopen at 8 a.m. on Dec. 26 for gift exchanges and returns.
